member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: New Public Constructor for Zombie where value must be greater than or equal to 0. If value is less than 0, throw an ArgumentException with the message "Health must be greater or equal to 0
member.param: value to be entered by main

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.GetHealth
member.summary: Returns the value of health of the Zombie object

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.ToString
member.summary: Override ToString to print Zombie object's attributes
